title: can you drop from gold 5 to silver 1?
body:
can you drop from gold 5 to silver 1?
and if so how? is it like x games lost @gold 5 ?

replies.body: yes, you can. you need to have the mmr of silver 5.

On the flip side it can be very demoralising jumping up to silver 5 and being matched with newbies and people who have not managed to drop after lucky placements.

yes but its extremely difficult.

To drop a tier you have the have the same MMR as someone in the lowest division of that tier.
So basically you have to lose a lot in order to fall to a lower tier.

If you notice there are are lot of Silver 5's in your game you probably in the danger zone. However if you have high silvers and golds then you probably dont need to worry that much.
